title: I CAN't INSTALL league

embed.description: Download the game and run the League of Legends installer to continue!

body:
this link link on the page isn't working it is taking me to a server not found plz help i cant install LoL !!!!!!![](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ShellInstaller/OC1/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe)
it keeps saying server not  found , i have been trying to find a like to get the league installer for  2 days any one have solution?

replies.body:
Rito PLZ fix this %%%%. Anyone got a download for mac?
Only reason I uninstalled was I got 6 bugsplats in 1 ranked and after that couldnt even open league.

The same thing here. i was trying to fix my launcher using tips available at   -->http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/

{{summoner:4}}  {{summoner:14}} 

> Server not found
> 
> Firefox can't find the server at l3cdn.riotgames.com.ipaddress.com.
> 
>     Check the address for typing errors such as ww.example.com instead of www.example.com
>     If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer's network connection.
>     If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web.
